price: 18. Ma jiro eray (aadmiga) ka soo baxa, oo uusan ag joogin ilaaliye (malag) u diyaar ah (inuu qoro).
arabic: مَّا يَلۡفِظُ مِن قَوۡلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيۡهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: mā yalfiẓu min qawlin illā ladayhi raqībun ʿatīdun
